title: [BUG] model can't be registered on MLFLOW

labels.name: area/model-registry
labels.description: Model registry, model registry APIs, and the fluent client calls for model registry

body:
### Issues Policy acknowledgement

- [X] I have read and agree to submit bug reports in accordance with the [issues policy](https://www.github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/ISSUE_POLICY.md)

### Willingness to contribute

Yes. I would be willing to contribute a fix for this bug with guidance from the MLflow community.

### MLflow version

 1.28.0

### System information

- **OS Platform and Distribution**: macOS 12.0
- **Python version**: Python 3.8.13

### Describe the problem

I tried to save and registered the transformer model on **mlflow**, I followed this [example][1], and the model is successfully saved at the Artifact for the current run. However, **it can't be registered to the model registry.** Any idea why?


    import mlflow
    
    mlflow.set_experiment('bert-classification')
    
    with mlflow.start_run():
        mlflow.pyfunc.log_model('classifier', 
                                python_model=BertTextClassifier(), 
                                artifacts=artifacts, 
                                signature=signature,
                                registered_model_name='bert-rating-classification')


**Note: I can registry the artifact model manually from UI, but I need to do it via code.**
  [1]: https://github.com/santiagxf/mlflow-deployments/blob/main/transformer-classifier/bert-for-classification.ipynb

### Tracking information

_No response_

### Code to reproduce issue

    import mlflow
    
    mlflow.set_experiment('bert-classification')
    
    with mlflow.start_run():
        mlflow.pyfunc.log_model('classifier', 
                                python_model=BertTextClassifier(), 
                                artifacts=artifacts, 
                                signature=signature,
                                registered_model_name='bert-rating-classification')

### Stack trace

Only stuck after saving the model and can't end the execution.

```
/Users/myuser/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/_distutils_hack/__init__.py:33: UserWarning: Setuptools is replacing distutils.
  warnings.warn("Setuptools is replacing distutils.")
```

### Other info / logs

_No response_

- [ ] `area/server-infra`: MLflow Tracking server backend

- [ ] `area/uiux`: Front-end, user experience, plotting, JavaScript, JavaScript dev server
- [ ] `area/docker`: Docker use across MLflow's components, such as MLflow Projects and MLflow Models

- [ ] `area/windows`: Windows support

- [ ] `language/r`: R APIs and clients
